HWA_DebugStats_t Struct Reference
HWA Driver External Data Structures

HWA Debug statistics. More...

#include <drivers/hwa/hwa.h>

Data Fields

Detailed Description

HWA Debug statistics.

HWA debug - current paramset, loopcount, trigger status - that are output from the statistics block.

Field Documentation

uint16_t HWA_DebugStats_t::currentLoopCount

the loop count that is presently running

uint8_t HWA_DebugStats_t::currentParamSet

Index of the current paramset that is under execution. useful for debug, where parameter-sets can be executed one-by-one using SW trigger mode for each of them. In such a debug, this register indicates which parameter-set is currently waiting for the SW trigger

uint8_t HWA_DebugStats_t::dfePingPongStatus

the status of DFE ping-pong trigger

uint16_t HWA_DebugStats_t::dmaTrigStatus

indicates whether a trigger was received via DMA trigger method

uint8_t HWA_DebugStats_t::swTrigStatus

the status of software trigger
